website_summaries.verdict: We think bargain-conscious consumers will appreciate having a solid wood TV tray at a great entry-level price point.
pros: Solid rubberwood construction with metal reinforcement
Optimal height for dining and snacking
cons: Some customer complaints about excessive wobbling
Can close quickly and unexpectedly while transporting

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty disappointed with this
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty disappointed with this. The cross piece at the bottom is a bad board, rough cut on top with splinters and kind of gray. The silly part is that it's fine on the bottom, if they had rotated it 180 degrees it would look fine. Fortunately, it was so poorly glued it was easy to break it apart, rotate, re-glue, sand, and put a coat of poly on it. There is also a split in the top that goes 1/4 of the way across.
customer_reviews.author: Randyg

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well-made
customer_reviews.text: I took this out of the box today and set it up. I was very happily surprised at how sturdy this is. It's a heavy little thing. It appears to be very sturdy and well-made. I'm very happy with it and recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Rice

customer_reviews.title: A great buy.
customer_reviews.text: For the money these are really nice. Real wood, sturdy and good looking. You can't buy cheap tin ones at Walmart for this price. They come fully assembled and ready to go. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Billieg

customer_reviews.title: i shouldv'e bought these tables sooner
customer_reviews.text: we just moved in to a new house, and by just i mean about a month ago and yes we are still living out of boxes. anyway, my friend suggested i buy a couple of these tables, which was probably the best purchase i have made in a very long time. we use them for all meals (still haven't received our table we ordered) and will be useful when kids come over they can draw/color on these table as oppose to elsewhere that can be damaged. love them! so easy to open/close and really has just made life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: no assembly
customer_reviews.text: i was making a man-cave hamburger and a knock at the door. postal service from amazon, my tv tray snack table being delivered 1 day early. what perfect time. i don't have to eat on the seat of another chair anymore to watch tv in the man-cave. this is all wood,easy to open and close, really flat when folded up ans stores in tight places. stands very sturdy on a flat floor of course, and the top is a very smooth finish but not glossy
customer_reviews.author: JAMES ROSE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wood but not well made
customer_reviews.text: The tray was missing one screw. I found one and it would not stay as the hole was stripped. A bigger screw was used and then the bigger screw and the adjacent smaller screw came out so the tray was not attached. More screws and wood glue may have solved the problem. I really like the looks of this tray but you may need to rebuild it if you buy one.
customer_reviews.author: German Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these for my dad because he is staying with us. He leaned on it while he was sitting on his bed, in order to reach something on the floor and the tv tray snapped. (He is maybe 130 pounds) For the cost of this product, you would expect it to hold up a little better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Krista S.

customer_reviews.title: Let me put this on the Table for you.
customer_reviews.text: This folding tv table is a most useful piece of furniture in our family room. for eating, paying bills, stacking a few books, drawing, coloring, resting a brewski watching rehashed sports, just about anything imaginable, almost. It is very sturdy, cleans up easily and great when used by my grands for their activities. In process of buying another right now
customer_reviews.author: Grove Hall Girl

customer_reviews.title: Stable and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and attractive, this does what it is supposed to. Handy height for sitting on a sofa and working on a laptop. Also use it occasionally as a temporary bedside table. For some strange reason the plastic packaging cannot be removed completely from underneath the table surface, it's blocked by two pieces of wood. Irritating but not especially important since the underside of the table is not visible.
customer_reviews.author: SF Bay Area Mom

customer_reviews.title: Amazon again failed to deliver properly
customer_reviews.text: This table is made of rubberwood and therefore heavy. It is sturdy but not easy to carry. This would not be much of a problem if the Amazon driver delivered it at the front door per instructions. Since the driver just dumped it in the lobby, the remainder of the delivery process fell on me. Not good for a handicapped person to have to wrestle with this.
customer_reviews.author: gomez addams

customer_reviews.title: ... so she can relax on the couch with her favorite drink and meal
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Mom so she can relax on the couch with her favorite drink and meal. It's easy to open and very sturdy. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Monique M. Inglese

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and useful
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a table just like this before and used it beside me bed after I had surgery. Recently, I tried to find anothe one locally, but the only ones I could find were flimsy and made of black metal. This table is very sturdy, solid, and yet easy to fold and store when not in use. The cost is very reasonable and it cam very solidly packed.
customer_reviews.author: GreatLady

customer_reviews.title: Not level. Wobbley
customer_reviews.text: I unboxed the PJ Wood Folding TV Tray last night and right away noticed that one side of the table is shorter than the other. (in the photo, table on the right) And it is VERY wobbley and flimsy compared to the older table on the left. Unfortunately the trash truck took the box it came in this morning before I could catch it or I would have returned the PJ Wood TV Table. Sad
customer_reviews.author: Davidoncoast

customer_reviews.title: assembled and ready to go
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to eat from your couch as you watch TV. I had one and was sharing with my boyfriend so I got him his own. No assembly required. Take it out of the box and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Torres

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Side Table or TV Tray
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one for our living room and purchased a second one a couple of years later. Same great quality. My 93 year old mom uses it for her meals and reading material. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HippieChick

customer_reviews.title: Love these little tables
customer_reviews.text: These tables are just right for placement just about anywhere you wish you had a surface to hold things. Here's some ways I use them: by the front door to put items to go out, in the kitchen as a work surface, by an armchair, a portable place for the fan, I'm always finding new ways to use these. So glad they are available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: The top doesn't come off like some.
customer_reviews.text: The legs could have been a little wider. This basically is how they made TV trays years ago, they just now make them similar with less wood. The big advantage is the tray doesn't fall off of it. It better not, because I paid a tremendous large amount of money for just one. That's the disadvantage. I would have bought three more, if they had been at a decent, reasonable price, but they weren't.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: A snack table at the right height for in front of the chair and big enough
customer_reviews.text: This solid wood table is just perfect. The finish is lovely, the legs fold easily, it will hold one dinner plate and a drink (not much more, but eough for an evening meal or snack). It's easy to store. Very well made and it more than reasonably priced. Very happy...would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Review

customer_reviews.title: Average quality table with some imperfections
customer_reviews.text: Good price, but not great quality. The table isn’t super sturdy (kind of wobbles side to side) and the wood on this particular table’s surface has several parts where it looks like the finish wore off to expose the particle board (one of which kind of looks phallic, bummer). I just ordered it to hold some potted plants so it’s fine for my purposes, but not ideal. Wouldn’t order again. Too lazy to return bc I need it now.
customer_reviews.author: Halle

customer_reviews.title: Handy side table for my den
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tray to be a side table in my den, which isn’t arranged well for a coffee table. It is just right for that — a place to put drinks and snacks while entertaining. Then when the guests go home, I fold it up and store it in the closet
customer_reviews.author: Divascribe

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 96-year old mother to eat her snacks on while she watches her tv. Easy for her to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: wearymom

customer_reviews.title: Height good.  Not much space in closet required for storage.
customer_reviews.text: Each time I set it up I have to lay it flat on floor to move the legs correctly for it to open. Taking down not too bad. Nice one side doesn't have rung in way of feet. Finish not sanded as thoroughly as I would have done. Finish a bit thin.
customer_reviews.author: northwyndy

customer_reviews.title: Color is not like photo
customer_reviews.text: color in the picture is more yellow than what is delivered....i tried to match a set i already own...this tray is much more of a bare wood color....or natural as stated however i expectrd it to match the photo.....additionally it is considerably lighter than the ones in my older original set.....not as sturdy/strong either....the opening slide rail underneath is merely a bent metal rail similar to a metal hanger (slightly thicker than a coat hanger) screwed in on each end.......but not the quality of the old ones i own. They do not lock into place once opened.
customer_reviews.author: M Warner

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty darn good TV table
customer_reviews.text: I grew up when everyone had TV tables to put their Swanson Hungry Man TV dinners on. This is much better. I like it a lot. There are some design and finish details that could be improved but it's a good value for the cost. I may buy another.
customer_reviews.author: James Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making the most of a small space
customer_reviews.text: This TV tray is awesome- folds up and fits behind the couch when not in use but serves as a great side table in a small living room with no room for an actual side table in the area. So far it's very sturdy, simple to fold, and not so heavy that it's cumbersome or difficult to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice TV tray
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad because he doesn’t get around very well anymore. It is very sturdy and easy to fold up and put aside when not needed. It serves as his desk, portable kitchen table and end table. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Clark

customer_reviews.title: A Good Table For Many Uses
customer_reviews.text: I use this table for a window fan that won't fit in my window- but obviously it could be used for eating off of, or for plants you want to put near sunlight during the winter. Well made, sturdy, and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Salniker

customer_reviews.title: Multi dependable foldaway wooden TV tray
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with mobility Due to a accident in the year 2003 so I can’t walk without two canes & only short Distance. I purchased this Folding wooded TV tray so I could use it to have my meals on. It is very strong but light enough that I can handle it, to put close to where I can store it when not in use. I also use it to sat up my weekly medication too among other things.
customer_reviews.author: Helen D. Olguin

customer_reviews.title: Well I really didn't order this in the first place ...
customer_reviews.text: Well I really didn't order this in the first place, had placed it in my shopping cart to view again later. Somehow it automatically ordered. Had I been given that opportunity and seen that it was only 2 trays for the price I wouldn't have ordered it. $24 is kind of expensive for just 2 trays when I can get a whole set and stand for $30-$40.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Nourie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, handy snack table
customer_reviews.text: Space saving alternative to having a card table up. A friend often comes over after church to watch a game with us. Likes a snack and coffee and this works well. Wood is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F

customer_reviews.title: Rickety, but fine.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty rickety if you intend to eat on this table. If you just need a cheap side table to use in a pinch, this is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. S. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This tray arrived quickly. It’s sturdy and quite beautiful. We can use it as an impromptu work space for visitors or use for dining. Very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Good table -- sturdy and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple table that is sturdy and affordable. I am getting a lot of use from it and would not hesitate to buy another if I needed one. Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: M. SWEET

customer_reviews.title: So easy to order online - these tables work well for ...
customer_reviews.text: So easy to order online - these tables work well for having dinner and watching TV. And I liked that I could order any number of them that I wanted. Instead of the usual four or sometimes two. A little bit stiff to open up - but they are very sturdy and don't shake. They are not lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Closes up very easily
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and more tabletop than others, but it has an annoying habit of closing up every time I want to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Melner

customer_reviews.title: Nice, smooth finish with substance
customer_reviews.text: Very stable and attractive looking tables. Nice, smooth finish with substance! Also, love the oak color; goes with any decor!
customer_reviews.author: W.

customer_reviews.title: Twins!
customer_reviews.text: Other than being the thickness of the top taller, it’s an exact match in design and materials to the one I’ve had for umpteen years!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Zoverdieux

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Tray, But Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to have a nice new TV tray, but that excitement dwindled as I revealed the product out of the box. 1- It is just a shade LIGHTER than pictured. 2- There is a significant scratch down the bottom right corner (photos included). Other than those two issues, it seems to be a wonderful TV tray as far as the actual use goes.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Eros

customer_reviews.title: Solid TV Tray
customer_reviews.text: arrived already assembled, easy set up, and storage is just 1.5" wide, so can be slid behind a couch or leaned up against a wall. very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: RogueBandit

customer_reviews.title: The BEST TV tray
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year and use it almost daily. I love it! It's so easy to fold and store, and cleans super easily. Mine is still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Hennington

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! I like to eat in the living room watching TV. Perfect size, sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Janet Kulesza

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I use this item to eat while watching tv. I have a small bedroom and I got tired of eating on my bed. The item came in a good condition carrying box that didn't have any damages. The table itself was in good condition as well ,no scratches or sticky substances on surface. it's sturdy enough for me to eat on which is the main reason I purchase it. I would recommend if you want it for the same purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Aretha c.

customer_reviews.title: TV tray - Snack Table - very nice
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple of these already and was happy to find a couple more. They work so nicely and come in handy. I recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Susan Clow

customer_reviews.title: This tray ha a nice simple look and is great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This tray ha a nice simple look and is great for the price. It seems that the design could stand to be improved to tighten up the side to side wiggle. It makes me nervous, feeling like my drink will spill if I bump the table just a little.
customer_reviews.author: loafer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: I needed one to match one I already owned. This item is sturdy, functional and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Cobb

customer_reviews.title: TWO?
customer_reviews.text: LIGHTER weight than older ones, but just as useful. Don't buy one--BUY TWO. THEY HAVE A MILLION USES.
customer_reviews.author: angilique darlington

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: All of the starred items above but also very stable on carpeted floor! Well worth the money and more.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Card

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok product but it wobbles. The feet are not straight and even so the table wobbles.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: Great and reliable product. And this product has it all. I highly recommend buying it
customer_reviews.text: Great product for Anyway You Want It to watch TV while they eat and looks wonderful with a laptop computer or tablet. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Laird Kroeger

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my dad to use when he was ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad to use when he was taking chemo so he didn't have to get up to move to the dining room table. He and my mom both still use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: JC3

customer_reviews.title: Good solid table
customer_reviews.text: These are very good solid tables for the cost. We use them often. They are constantly folded and opened back up, and remain in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Q.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: i eat bedside a lot and this table is great. the color is nice and it's easy to fold and unfold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: legs not even
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these; one is still in the box. The other is not level. Frustrating as hell when you buy a brand new table and it wobbles. The finish is good, it does fold up, but it will require 20 minutes or so here this weekend to even these legs out.
customer_reviews.author: Earl D Walker

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Handy Dandy little side table, east to set up and put away. Pretty wood and sturdy, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne J. Bolling

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying this tray table because there is no wobbling! It's a little heavy but that is what makes it lasting and sturdy. I am thinking I should have bought a tray holder.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Good solid made little t.v. tray.
customer_reviews.text: Good table all the way around, I have no complaints with it whatsoever so you have a happy customer thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect table for the laptop, as well as using as a TV table for meals. Very happy with this product. Love the natural wood finish!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: It meets my needs.
customer_reviews.text: It's made out of wood and it will not rust. I use it in my garage as a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: folding table
customer_reviews.text: nice looking and the right size. just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Natural Wood Tray
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tray, sturdy, solid, and well made. The height is just right, and this TV tray serves it's purpose. Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Oscar H.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I guess I got what I paid for. What a piece of junk. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: daria

customer_reviews.title: TV tray
customer_reviews.text: works for me ! I got two , one for me & a guest ; )
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: A solid support that stores in a small space.
customer_reviews.text: No assembly required ... works out of the box. Built and finished well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: Nice table.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy. My grandson uses it when he is playing his videos.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Purdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great folding tray. Its study and looks great. A+
customer_reviews.author: Amy T

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: when all you need is a snack table for a party or some other periotic use, this makes the most sense.
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid tray table
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid tray table, I was worried it might wobble a bit like older tray tables I've had in the past. However, not a wobble in sight, sits still and doesn't move on the carpet in my living room. Has a nice finish and is well put together.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: YES - just "YES"
customer_reviews.text: Sure wish P.J. made bigger desks, tables and bookcases using this wood and level of quality. The design has not changed in years - and dosen't need to !
customer_reviews.author: Gruddy

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Not as substantial as a similar table I bought years ago but serves its purpose... no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Artzy

customer_reviews.title: Wooden TV tray
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wooden TV tray for a while! This is very sturdy and easy to fold up! I move this tray all over and it is a good size!
customer_reviews.author: Fox1988

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Nothing great or terrible to say about this product. It works the way it's supposed to,
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Great table for eating and watching movies and TV!
customer_reviews.text: Just the correct size. Small, but works for me! Can sit in the living room, eat and watch a movie! Sturdy. Folds up easily. Does not take up much room. Put into a closet and voila!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Price was higher than I wanted but the product is well made and works great
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just fine
customer_reviews.text: The quality is so-so, but I didn't look for a stylish furniture. I was looking for a folding table with decent price that I'm going to use now and then to place my cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: Table is a bit wobbly but it gets the job done. No more sitting the plate in my lap to spill.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Good table to use while watching tv
customer_reviews.text: It matches a table we had and is a good table for eating while watching tv
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Schlappi

customer_reviews.title: A little wobbly side-to-side.
customer_reviews.text: Came as I expected. Nice to have it already assembled. However, it is a little wobbly side-to-side. I hope this does not effect how long it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Folding Table... and it Does Its Job
customer_reviews.text: This wooden folding table does what it’s supposed to do without feeling cheap or wobbly. It’s constructed very well and has a nice, sturdy feel to it. Ignore 1-Star reviews of people with slanted floors and expectations that this was handcrafted by colonial carpentry experts.
customer_reviews.author: 666cats666

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: Table was unstable, because for some weird reason the bottoms of all 4 legs were shaped differently. One was rounded, one was flat, one had 2 flat sides, and one had 3 flat sides. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy tray table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice-looking, sturdy tray table. Can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Loralei

customer_reviews.title: Solid wood product! Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.text: Very very solid tables! These are NOT cheap and flimsy. These TV trays (portable collapsible tables) will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Its a food tray, what else do you want?
customer_reviews.text: Im just using this as a keyboard rest for my flight sim cockpit for a temporary time. Who cares? Its a piece of wood with 4 legs.
customer_reviews.author: Me, myself and I

customer_reviews.title: these are crap!!
customer_reviews.text: these are crap!!! very wobbly!! Cannot use at all! I didnt open soon enough to return as relative was in hospital, wish I had taken the time before I left to help her! Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Ember

customer_reviews.title: Shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product! The stands are a little wiggly, however dont effect overall performance. Great for laptops and now I have something to eat on besides my lap while watching tv
customer_reviews.author: ashley hibbs

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, I keep a heavy evaporative cooler time fan on it in the summer
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Turner

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: I love the workmanship of this table. It's easy to use and made sturdy and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Marley

customer_reviews.title: Unstable Table
customer_reviews.text: Needing several tables of this type I bought one of these to check quality. The table I got was assembled so that when set up on a level surface one of the three legs was about 1/2 inch above the floor. It took me about an hour of cutting and sanding to get the table to sit level and stable with all four legs on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sims

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap feeling quality and wood.. not even close to the set I had before, that looked identical. I thought I was buying an identical one based off the pictures, they look pretty close, but holy cow are they different in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris VT

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and got this for my Mother not to eat ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and got this for my Mother not to eat off of but to put the things she needs while watching TV and it works great and looks good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Magnus

customer_reviews.title: A bit wobbly, but it does OK
customer_reviews.text: This is not quite as sturdy as I had hoped. But it is OK. The legs do not all hit the ground exactly the same, so there is a bit of a wobble.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Tv table
customer_reviews.text: Hi table not sturdy at all.cant be bothered to return it. Also not good wood stain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value.
customer_reviews.text: Solid wood, simple design, well constructed, stable, practical, great value... need I say more?
customer_reviews.author: C. Goyette

customer_reviews.title: I like it . . .
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the weight of the table and the fact that it is wood. I only wish it had some sort of caster on the legs. It is certainly a step up from my old Target TV table. Looks nice, too!
customer_reviews.author: Claire S.

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Had some damage on one leg... we used sandpaper to smooth out the large splinter... too much trouble to return. Needed to use right away... person home from hospital so I needed a side table by the couch.. it is very useful... thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jean Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice table. I light the height and it gives good support.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: I wish the feet of the legs were made better. The tray wobbles too much
customer_reviews.text: I wish the feet of the legs were made better. The tray wobbles too much, but for the price, i should have expected it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I use it for extra space in my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L Roos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these tables I now have 4, easy to put up and store
customer_reviews.author: C L Tingley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it, it's very sturdy and great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it!! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

product_meta.title: PJ Wood Single Folding TV Tray & Snack Table - Natural
feature_bullets: Folding, fully assembled, ready to use single TV tray, snack table. Light weight and folds flat for convenient, space saving storage
Sturdy, durable solid wood construction with spacious table top surface for versatile everyday use
Versatile use, ideal for snacks and meals in front of the TV, use for work or play surface and more
Modern, classic, stylish design that will fit to almost any interiors
Product Dimension: L 19.09" x W 14.57" x H 26"
